/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the scene. The street is flanked by buildings painted in vibrant hues of yellow and red, adding a splash of color to the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a striking contrast to the colorful buildings. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. The image is taken from a low angle, which enhances the grandeur of the buildings and the expansive sky.
